pages.text: Entries from installed Warium add-ons appear here. If none are installed, this page is all you'll see; install add-ons for tutorials tailored to their machines.

pages.title: For Add-on Authors
pages.text: Target the book id $(bold)warium_integrations:integration_manual$(). Ship your entry JSON under data/warium_integrations/patchouli_books/integration_manual/entries/addons/<your_entry>.json with category set to warium_integrations:addons. You can also add new categories under the same book path if you need more structure.
